readable.title: 2695093520_5cfeb0729d
readable.content: A couple are holding hands next to a very large mirror outdoors . A couple stands in the street with their backs to a large mirror . a girl wearing a red shirt holding the hand of a man near a street . A man in a white shirt and sunglasses is holding hands with a woman wearing a red shirt outside . A woman in a red shirt and a man in white stand in front of a mirror .
